query: Rasputitsa Spring Classic gravel race Burke

videos.title: Rasputitsa 2019
videos.description:
Rasputitsa is a Russian word for the mud season during spring when the roads become impassable. It is also a Gravel Race in East Burke, Vermont where people test their mental as well as physical abilities.

This year was a true mental battle, to choose to start the race and to stay in as it rained, snowed, and sleeted on us. Wet gear, frozen fingers and toes, 42 miles, and 4700ft of climbing. All in temps of 37F (3C) to 41F (5C) degrees.

This video is going to have a lot of water and mud on the lens but you'll get the idea. It was tough.

Follow along @
 - Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/10732093
 - Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mthistle/

videos.title: Rasputitsa 2022 ReconRecap
videos.description:
Was a beautiful day for the 2022 Rasputitsa Spring Classic - an amazing gravel cycling event in the Northeast Kingdom of Vermont.  Many, many thanks to the organizers for an awesome weekend!

https://rasputitsadirt.com

Music: "Thunderbird" by Ryan Taubert

videos.title: Rasputitsa Spring Classic 2022 - The Return
videos.description:
After a two-year hiatus due to global circumstances, the @rasputitsaspringclassic8395  returned in 2022, holding what was originally meant to be the 2020 edition, at long last. The event drew a crowd of thousands to celebrate, ride, shop, eat, drink and socialize over a two-day event at Burke Mountain Resort in Vermont. The stoke was high.

Ian Boswell and Lea Davison may have dominated the front of the peloton, but the middle of the pack was all about camaraderie, beard competitions, cookies & shots and some unforgettable spring gravel riding. 

Join us for a ride in the dirt on the Rasputitsa Spring Classic.

Featured in this video: @handupgloves6777 
Rasputitsa Spring Classic: https://rasputitsadirt.com/
Bon/Firevt: https://www.facebook.com/BonFirevt
Burke Mountain Resort: https://www.skiburke.com/

videos.title: Rasputitsa Spring Classic
videos.description: Rasputitsa is Russian for the mud season when roads become difficult to traverse. The Rasputitsa is a psychotic 45 mile, insane, drop to your knees and cry sufferfest with an absurdly section so difficult that people won't believe your stories called Cyberia.
